u.a: leans closer to Chuck . looks at oranges
<bef> looks at room . <dur> looks at orange
<bef> leans close . picks up orange piece . <aft> leans back
<bef> kind of jumps . <aft> eats . takes orange
pulls orange skins from mouth . throws skins
<aft> goes to get cough medicine . returns with medicine and sets it on counter
<bef> tenderly touches Chuck's back . wipes his mouth
<bef> looks at Chuck . leans close . <dur> shrugs hand
holds medicine close to Mother's face
eats . takes rind out of mouth and gives to Mother
glances at camera and smiles . glances at Mother and smiles
eats . sets rind in pile . squirms . eats
<bef> reaches for orange . <dur> hands seed to Mother
<aft> sets down slice . plays with orange
<1w> leans close and looks at Chuck
<bef> takes out seed . <dur> looks at seed . <aft> sets seed on counter
<aft> picks up napkin and gives to Chuck
puts orange in mouth . turns to Mother and eats
<aft> goes to kitchen , comes back and sits
